East Sac County Grab N Go Meal Program

div.p: East Sac County Community School District will be providing Grab and Go meals to all children ages 1-18. Below is important information regarding the program:

ol.li: The program will be available Monday-Friday for children ages 1-18.
Children will be provided two meals per day:

div.p: Breakfast (for the following day): cereal, fruit, milk
**Meals subject to change based on availability.

ol.li: Grab N Go pick up points:

div.p: Wall Lake Elementary Building: North Side (Gym Doors)
High School (Lake View): West Doors facing the student parking lot
Middle School (Sac City): North Parking Lot

ol.li: If you have special dietary needs CLICK HERE and complete the form

p.span: NO SCHOOL at East Sac County for the rest of the 2019-20 school year
***All school -related COVID-19 announcements can be seen HERE***

strong.span: Please continue to check the ESC school website and Facebook page for continuing information.

div.span: East Sac County Schools are in need of associates at the High School, Middle School and Sac City Elementary building. To apply click HERE and go to “associate” under Job Listings.
East Sac County High School 2019-2020 Yearbooks are still on sale! Click Last chance order form for the order form or go to jostensyearbooks.com to order online

br.span: East Sac County School has a notification system for weather related and emergency notifications. Through GovDelivery you can subscribe to one place and choose how you want to be notified: email, text, Facebook, Twitter, etc.

span.span: To sign up for ESC announcements go HERE
